description: It’s hard to stay quiet about a pant that conquers all climates and adapts to every adventure. The Silencer™ Pant features a lightweight ripstop fabric equipped with stretch and rebound for superior flexibility and comfort. Kuhl's articulated design allows your body to move freely and naturally on nature’s toughest trails. Water-resistance and premium (UPF 50) sun protection allows extended time outdoors.
name: Kuhl Silencr Pants, 36" Inseam - Mens
